schema.description:
集群ID。
> 您可以通过[DescribeDBClusters](~~98094~~)接口查询账号下所有集群的信息详情。

备份集ID。
> 若需要按备份集还原目标库表，该参数必传。您可以通过[DescribeBackups](~~98102~~)接口查看备份集ID。

还原时间点，格式为YYYY-MM-DDThh:mmZ（UTC时间）。
>* 若需要按时间点还原，该参数必填。
>* 仅支持恢复到7天内的任意时间点。

400.errorMessage: Specified restore type is not valid.
Specified restore time is not valid.
Specified backup set ID does not exist.
Current backup set state does not support operations.
Specified DB name already exists in the This instance.
There is insufficient capacity available for the requested instance.
At least one of BackupId and RestoreTime is malformed.
The request is missing a user_id parameter.
The request is missing a uid parameter.

403.errorMessage: Archive instance does not support restore table.

404.errorMessage: The DBClusterId provided does not exist in our records.
The available backup does not exist in recovery time.
The DBInstanceId provided does not exist in our records.

title: 恢复PolarDB实例的某些数据库或表到原实例
